Changeset.Change: Fix for Incident #17035 Survey Manager: Can't export survey results to csv due to Grid questions non answered
Fixed writing of CSV file encoding issue, now in UTF-8
Fix for Bug #10976 Survey Manager: export CSV fails when Survey name contains spaces
Generalised into questionnaire-manager, added possibility to define the purpose (Survey or Quiz) as configuration
fixed Bug #8951 : Survey Manager portlet: If multiple Sections are present only one is shown
Feature #9100, add button for managers to create automatically the survey page for users to take the survey
